Currently active SIM card slot.cmnd: ubus call sim get | grep sim | tr '":' ' ' | tr -d ' '

Digital Input (DIN1) state.cmnd: ubus call ioman.gpio.din1 status | grep value | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' ' | tr '"' ' '

Digital galvanically isolated input (DIN.cmnd: ubus call ioman.gpio.din2 status | grep value | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' ' | tr '"' ' '

Current WAN IP address.cmnd:
ifconfig wwan0 | grep -w "inet addr" | tr ' ' '
' | grep "addr" | cut -d ':' -f 2

Analog input (PIN 9) value.cmnd: ubus call ioman.adc.adc0 status | grep '"value":' | cut -d ':' -f 2 | tr ',' ' '

GPS latitude coordinate.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep latitude | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS longitude coordinate.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep longitude | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS fix time.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep '"timestamp":' | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS date and time.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep '"timestamp":' | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS speed.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep speed | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS satellite count.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep satellites | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

GPS accuracy.cmnd:
ubus call gpsd position | grep accuracy | tr ' ' '
' | grep ',' | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data received today (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'today', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep rx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent today (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'today', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data received this week (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'week', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep rx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent this week (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'week', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data received this month (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'month', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep rx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent this month (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'month', 'sim':1, 'current':true}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data received last 24h (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'day', 'sim':1, 'current':false}" | grep rx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent last 24h (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'day', 'sim':1, 'current':false}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Galvanically isolated open collector out.cmnd: ubus call ioman.gpio.iio status | grep value | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' ' | tr '"' ' '

Relay output status.cmnd: ubus call ioman.relay.relay0 status | grep state | cut -d ':' -f 2 | tr '"open"' '0' | tr '"closed"' '1' | cut -c 7-

Active SIM card.cmnd: ubus call sim get | grep "sim" | tail -c 2

Mobile data received last week (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'week', 'sim':1, 'current':false}" | grep rx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent last week (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'week', 'sim':1, 'current':false}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '

Mobile data sent last month (SIM1).cmnd: ubus call mdcollect get "{'period':'month', 'sim':1, 'current':false}" | grep tx | cut -d ':' -f 2 | cut -c 2- | tr ',' ' '
